Before you dive into the reflection, let’s take a look at the basic optic theory for light. It’s a fundamental theory that will be used in both reflection and refraction. The so-called “light as rays”. Light goes straightly, until: 1. it encounters a reﬂective material 2. it encounters a transparent material
